#summary More Screenshots.
#labels Featured

*Error Report Dialog.* This dialog appears when a critical error occurs in the application. The Error Report dialog allows to review report contents, provide user's Email and problem description, and send the report to the software's vendor.

http://crashrpt.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/img/CrashRpt/errordlg.png

*Error Report Dialog in Chinese.* `CrashRpt` user interface supports multiple languages. Currently, `CrashRpt` is translated to world's most spoken languages, such as English, Chinese, Spanish, Portuguese, Hindi, Russian and others.

http://crashrpt.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/img/CrashRpt/errordlg_chinese.png

*Error Report Dialog in Russian.* You even can translate a contribute a language file for your native language. Refer to the documentation for more information.

http://crashrpt.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/img/CrashRpt/errordlg_russian.png

*Expanded Error Report Dialog.* Clicking the 'Provide additional information (recommended)' link allows to enter additional info about the problem, such as user's Email address and a short problem description. 

http://crashrpt.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/img/CrashRpt/errordlg_expanded.png

*Other Actions... Context Menu.* You can postpone error report delivery by pressing the 'Other Actions...' button and selecting an item from the context menu.

http://crashrpt.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/img/CrashRpt/errordlg_context_menu.png
